ruleBookContent:
<js>
id=result.match(/article_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
cid=result.match(/chapter_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
hash=result.match(/hash = "([\d\w]+)"/)[1];
tmp="http://www.52zsyd.com/home/index/ajaxchapter@id="+id+"&eKey="+hash+"&cid="+cid+"&basecid="+cid;
result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(tmp)).info.content
result=result.replace(/牛bb小说阅读网/g,"").replace(/xíng jǐng/g,"刑警").replace(/huáng sè/g,"黄色")
</js>
